Package com.example.duckduckgoose

package com.example.duckduckgoose

    Description

  • Class
    Description
    AdminConsoleActivity
    Main control panel for admin users.
    AdminManagerActivity
    Activity to display and manage the list of admin users.
    AppConfig
    Central configuration class for global app settings.
    AttendeeManagerActivity
    AttendeeManagerActivity Activity to manage the attendee/waitlist roster for an event.
    EditProfileSheet
    BottomSheetDialogFragment to edit user profile fields.
    EntrantManagerActivity
    EntrantManagerActivity Manages and displays entrant users retrieved from Firestore.
    Event
    Event model with Firestore-backed waitlist/registration operations.
    EventDetailActivity
    Detail screen for a single event.
    EventDetailsAdminActivity
    Activity for administrative actions on a specific event.
    EventDetailsOrganizerActivity
    Activity for organizers to view and manage a single event.
    EventEditActivity
    Activity for organizers to create or edit events stored in Firestore.
    EventManagerActivity
    Activity for administrators to manage and inspect events.
    EventManagerAdapter
    Adapter class that binds Event objects into a scrollable list for management.
    EventManagerAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Callback interface for event item click handling.
    ImageManagerActivity
    Displays an editable image grid and attaches top bar profile actions.
    ImageManagerAdapter
    Adapter that shows image previews and supports per-item deletion.
    LoginActivity
    Shows sign-in and registration flows; sets AppConfig role and navigates.
    MainActivity
    Hosts the event list and "My Events" screens; routes to detail/edit.
    OrganizerManagerActivity
    OrganizerManagerActivity Manages and displays organizer users retrieved from Firestore.
    OrganizerProfileActivity
    Displays basic organizer details and provides a delete option.
    ProfileSheet
    A Material BottomSheet that shows a user's profile and actions.
    ProfileSheet.OnProfileInteractionListener
    Listener interface to notify host activities/fragments about destructive/profile-related actions initiated from the sheet.
    TopBarWiring
    Utility class for attaching top-bar interactions.
    UserManagerAdapter
    Adapter for rendering a list of User items in a RecyclerView.
    UserManagerAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Callback for row tap events.
